applyTo: "**"
---

Default workflow:

1) Check existing docs/scripts first.
2) Prefer READ-ONLY analysis before proposing changes.
3) Use explicit dates (default: last 30 full days up to yesterday) and clear KPIs.
4) For Google Ads Shopping requests, use `/root/projects/Google Cloud/ads` scripts and check `.milestones.json` there first.
